Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-24786 affecting package moby-containerd-cc for versions less than 1.7.7-8
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-24786 affecting package moby-containerd-cc for versions less than 1.7.7-8. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package moby-containerd-cc is earlier than 1.7.7-8, affected by CVE-2024-24786
